Security.AdminRequired: Administrator privileges are required to run this operation.
Security.SystemDiskWarning: WARNING: This appears to be a system disk. Formatting will destroy your Windows installation!
Security.DiskValidationFailed: Disk validation failed. Cannot proceed with format operation.
Security.ConfirmDestructive: This operation is destructive and cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to continue?

Configuration.ConfigLoadFailed: Failed to load configuration, using defaults

Download.HashMismatch: Hash verification failed! File may be corrupted.

Format.DiskTooLarge: Warning: Disk is larger than 512GB. Please verify this is the correct SD card.

Menu.InstallWithoutFormat: Install / Upgrade / Reinstall Onion (without formatting SD card)
Menu.InstallWithoutFormatTooltip:
This will download and update Onion. It will keep your data
(including ROMs, saves, and RetroArch configuration)
Menu.FormatAndInstall: Format SD card and install Onion
Menu.FormatAndInstallTooltip:
This will format your SD card in FAT32
(all the data on the SD card will be deleted),
Then it will download and install Onion on your SD Card.
Menu.MigrateStock: Migrate stock SD card to a new SD card with Onion
Menu.MigrateStockTooltip:
This is a complete migration procedure for Onion.
It will backup your Miyoo stock SD card (bios, ROMs, and saves)
then it will format your new SD card in FAT32, download and
install Onion, and then restore your stock backup data.
Menu.BackupSDCard: Backup Onion or Stock SD card data
Menu.AboutText:

By Schmurtz (Onion Team)

Menu.InsertOnionSD: Insert Onion target SD card now.
